summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2156, for the improvement of Tenth Avenue Northeast, from Sylvester Place to East Sixty-fifth Street, and Sylvester Place, from Tenth Avenue Northeast to Twelfth Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 21615, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
